CustomField.description: Displays the target of the current month by.
CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( MONTH( TODAY() ) ,3) , 1, Prospecting_PreSales_Target_Month_1__c , 2, Prospecting_PreSales_Target_Month_2__c , Prospecting_PreSales_Target_Month_3__c )
CustomField.label: Prospecting Target Current Month
